easy.q: I have a face but no eyes, hands but no arms. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a tiny word that changes when you add letters

hard.q: A riddle: A town has 100 houses. Each house has 1 door and 1 window. If every door and window is painted the same color, how many colors are needed to paint all doors and windows if each house uses a different color for its door and its window, but adjacent houses must not share the same color? (Assume only doors and windows; ignore other surfaces.)
hard.hint: Think of coloring doors and windows as pairs, with a simple pattern to avoid clashes
